title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Despite winning their 5th game in a row, Colin explains why the Chiefs should be worried about Patrick Mahomes' struggles as they try to win another Super Bowl. He makes the case for Tom Brady being the NFL's MVP this season at the age of 44. He also tells you why he was right about Lincoln Riley and wrong about Tua Tagovailoa. Plus, Notre Dame's new head coach Marcus Freeman joins the show to discuss the challenges of maintaining excellence and when he found out Brian Kelly was leaving for LSU.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
